Political Non-Profit Hiring Web Developer / Technology Producer

Citizen Engagement Laboratory (CEL) is a nonprofit organization that inspires political and social change using technology and digital media. We do this by incubating national online organizing projects like ColorOfChange.org and Presente.org, and running a wide array of issue-based campaigns.

CEL is hiring a Web Developer to support all aspects of our organizing work, including design and implementation of new web sites and web applications and maintenance of existing web assets. This person will join two other web developers to join our expanding technology team. We are a django shop, and build custom tools that are on the cutting edge of online organizing.

Full listing at http://www.python.org/community/jobs/

CEL is also hiring a Technology Producer to play the lead project management role for our technology department. We're looking for someone who gets fired up about going from concept to launch in a week, can manage multiple projects at once, is supremely detail oriented, has a deft touch for getting people to meet deadlines, and loves developing systems for better communication and efficiency. The Technology Producer will work closely with two software developers as well as a host of campaigners, strategists, and partners.

Full listing at http://sfbay.craigslist.org/eby/sof/2467427022.html

This is a mission driven organization, and our most successful employees (even technologists) believe strongly in the content of our work. If you want your code to help everyday people to create political and social change, this is the job for you.

Location in Berkeley, CA Contact jobs@engagementlab.org to apply
